amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to eliminating deductions for corporate compensation in excess of $1,000,000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 919 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 54. Record Vote Number: 127.

action.text: Amendment SA 919 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Reed.
